attributes.action: Leave Gp Surgeries As They Are, NO Poly Clinics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leave Gp's Surgeries as they are. If you have an illness that is with you for life then you need a Gp that you know and you do not want to be just a number. I have an illness myself and having a gp that knows you as a person and not a number is so very important when coping.
